product_name: North Water Paddle Britches On-Deck Paddle Storage
long_description: Put your spare paddle in the North Water Paddle Britches On-Deck Paddle Storage and be prepared for potential hazards. Mount the North Water Paddle Britches on your kayak and insert your spare 2-piece paddle in each sleeve to ensure secure storage. Tapered polyethylene stiffeners ensure easy placement and removal of the paddle shaft time after time. Integrated rip-and-stick fasteners work with your kayak's deck lines. "Legs" of Paddle Britches are designed to remain open and drain water. North Water Paddle Britches use a reflective band to enhance safety in dim light; band can also be used to hold a fishing rod.
short_description: Put your spare paddle in the North Water Paddle Britches On-Deck Paddle Storage and be prepared for potential hazards.
